c74object.name: fluid.plotter
c74object.digest: Plot data in a two-dimensional graph.
c74object.description: A JSUI object that plots data in a two-dimensional graph.
c74object.discussion:
Open the Overview Patch The fluid.plotter object can be used as a versatile solution for plotting points in a two-dimensional graph.
It is designed to easily accept the contents of a fluid.dataset~ via a dictionary as coordinates within the graph as well as the contents of a fluid.labelset~ via a dictionary as colours for points.
There is also an 'advanced' interface that allows the user to specify the coordinates and colours of the points in a more flexible and bespoke manner. See the help file for more information on this.
fluid.plotter is part of the Fluid Decomposition Toolkit of the FluCoMa project. For more explanations, learning material, and discussions on its musicianly uses, visit flucoma.org.

inlet.digest: A dictionary of coordinates for the points in the graph.
inlet.description: The dictionary of coordinates in the correct format for the plotter. By default, the dump method of a fluid.dataset~ will work.

inlet.digest: A dictionary of labels for the points in the graph.
inlet.description: The dictionary of labale in the correct format for the plotter. By default, the dump method of a fluid.labelset~ will work.

outlet.description: The position of the mouse will be reported while the mouse is over the plotter and is clicking and dragging. The position is constrained to the domain of the plotter.
Reports any updates made to the plotter view while zooming.

method.name: range
method.description: Set the x- and y-axis ranges.

method.name: colorscheme
method.description: Change the colour scheme for automatic colouring via a fluid.labelset~. Options are default, cat, accent, dark, paired, tableau, R4, R3, R2, R1, random. Taken mostly from d3-scale-chromatic.

method.name: setpoint
method.description: Set the point at the given coordinates.

method.name: pointcolor
method.description: Set the color of the point with a given identifier.

method.name: highlight
method.description: Emphasises the given identifier's points in the plot. Any number of identifiers as a list of symbols can be provided.

method.name: pointsize
method.description: Set the size of the point with a given identifier.

method.name: pointsizescale
method.description: Set the overall size of the points.

method.name: shape
method.description: Modifies the shape of the points.

method.name: bgcolor
method.description: Sets the background colour of the plotter.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the graph and all associated data and settings.

method.name: reset
method.description: An alias of clear. Clears the graph.
